subject: Sales
title: Cult Recruitment Tactics
description: A short lesson to help you apply Cult Recruitment Tactics.

hook.text: Nobody joins a cult on purpose. They join a warm, friendly group that slowly changes the rules.

buildup.text: Cults use love bombing: overwhelming newcomers with attention and warmth until they're hooked.

discovery.text: Then isolation begins. Cut outside ties. Control information. Make the group the only reality.

twist.text: These mirror aggressive sales tactics: create urgency, isolate the decision, and limit alternatives.

climax.text: Ethical selling never isolates buyers from other voices or outside information. Ever.

punchline.text: If a pitch demands isolation, it's manipulation.

quiz.question: What is 'love bombing' in cult recruitment?
options: Overwhelming newcomers with attention to hook them
